sentences.en: Clothes were thrown in the luggage in an untidy heap.
sentences.cn: 衣服被乱糟糟地扔进旅行箱里。

sentences.en: Don't worry, your luggage will come on afterwards by taxi.
sentences.cn: 别担心，你的行李随后会由出租车送过来。

sentences.en: Everyone helped to unload the luggage from the car.
sentences.cn: 大家都帮着从汽车上卸行李。

sentences.en: He waited until all the luggage was cleared, but Paula's never appeared.
sentences.cn: 他一直等到所有的行李都拿走了，但始终没看见葆拉的。

sentences.en: Her luggage remained unclaimed at Frankfurt Departures.
sentences.cn: 她的行李一直放在法兰克福机场，无人认领。

sentences.en: Leave your luggage in the hotel.
Let's check our luggage here and come back for it later.
sentences.cn: 行李先存在这里,回头再来取.

sentences.en: My rucksack was too big for the luggage rack.
sentences.cn: 我的背包太大了，行李架上放不下。

sentences.en: Paula had put out her luggage for the coach.
sentences.cn: 葆拉拿好行李准备上长途汽车。

sentences.en: Seeing he was embarrassed with his luggage, I offered to help him.
sentences.cn: 我看见他带着行李不方便, 就主动去帮他.

sentences.en: The porter put our scruffy rain-sodden luggage on a trolley.
sentences.cn: 搬运工把我们那些被雨水浸透的脏兮兮的行李放上了手推车。

sentences.en: There's room for one more piece of luggage.
sentences.cn: 还有地方再放一件行李。

sentences.en: They checked in their luggage and found seats in the departure lounge.
sentences.cn: 他们办完行李托运，到候机室找了座位坐下。

sentences.en: They searched his luggage for illegal drugs.
sentences.cn: 他们搜查他的行李看是否藏有毒品。

sentences.en: While Franklin saw to the luggage, Sara took Eleanor home.
sentences.cn: 富兰克林负责照看行李，萨拉则带着埃莉诺回家了。

trans.tran_en: the cases, bags etc that you carry when you are travelling
